title: How to Clean Dirty Dishcloths With Bleach

steps.title: Soak the dishcloths in a bucket of diluted bleach (20 parts water to 1 part bleach).
steps.content: Soak the dishcloths in a bucket of diluted bleach (20 parts water to 1 part bleach). Fill the bucket enough to cover the dishcloths.

steps.title: Rinse out under running cold water.
steps.content: Rinse out under running cold water.

steps.title: Allow to dry.
steps.content: Allow to dry. They should be clean and much better smelling than the day before.
